title: Dreamvision (paintings)
text: Dreamvision (paintings) is a <a href="Serial%20imagery">series</a> of 28 <a href="Oil%20painting">oil</a> <a href="painting">painting</a>s made by <a href="Nabil%20Kanso">Nabil Kanso</a> in 1980–81. The subjects of the works in the series are two figures of a man and woman whose characters and relations are reinforced by figurative allusions to their surroundings.
